alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:53PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN OKALOOSA COUNTY THROUGH 345 PM CDT... At 252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Niceville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crestview, Niceville, and Valparaiso. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
